alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:06PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Niobrara and eastern Converse Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 106 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manning Ranch, or 25 miles northwest of Lusk, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lance Creek and Manning Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for east central Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
